news.title: Putin and Trump's envoy set for key Ukraine talks in Moscow
news.summary: Steve Witkoff will hold talks at the Kremlin, after the White House said it was "optimistic" about a breakthrough.

news.title: Faisal Islam: OBR head's resignation leaves potential landmines for Reeves
news.summary: Chancellor's next mission to find a respected and credible economist to run the OBR will require careful balance

news.title: UK criticises Gaza aid delays as tents take year to arrive
news.summary: Foreign Secretary Yvette Cooper said the situation remains "dire" as the United Nations warned 1.5 million people are in need of urgent shelter.

news.title: Jury trial reforms set to be announced
news.summary: The changes will restrict the right to a jury trial in a bid to reduce the backlog of cases.

news.title: Australia won't be intimidated by firms over social media ban, minister tells BBC
news.summary: Anika Wells says she is 'ready to help' nations that wish to copy Australia's social media ban for under-16s.

news.title: Devastating toxic spill seen as test of whether African countries will stand up to China
news.summary: Chinese companies provide jobs and much needed revenue in Zambia, where the disaster took place.

news.title: White House doctor releases Trump's 'perfectly normal' MRI results
news.summary: The release comes as Democrats have been pushing to see the results amid concerns about Trump's age.

news.title: Jamie Laing's Candy Kittens to acquire UK snack brand Graze
news.summary: The deal comes as Unilever plans to offload some food brands to focus on care and beauty.

news.title: Italian town freezes Pavarotti statue knee-deep in Christmas ice rink, angering widow
news.summary: The opera legend's widow said the town had made an "absurd decision" after it also encouraged skaters to high five the statue.

news.title: Sound of 2026: 10 acts you'll be obsessed with next year
news.summary: The list tips new music for the coming year, following previous winners like Adele, Haim and Chappell Roan.
